episodes.title: The Many Sinister Sins of Pastor Schirmer
episodes.description:
Nestled within the Pocono Mountains, the tiny township of Reeders, Pennsylvania is a place where everyone knows everyone and rumors travels fast. It’s also a place where faith and church is everything. And in the Fall of 2008, something would happen that would completely rock the community. The body of 50 year old Joseph Musante was discovered inside of the local Methodist church. A closer look at the details surrounding Joseph’s death would uncover the sinister past of one of the town’s most beloved members…Pastor AB Schirmer.

episodes.title: The Secret Life Of A Polygamist Pastor | Sean Goff
episodes.description:
Go to https://buyraycon.com/sommersanchez to get up to 30% off site wide! 

On September 19th, 2003, 25 year old Joy Risker vanished without a trace. Her friends were worried sick and desperate to find her, but one person who didn’t seem to be worried, was Joy’s husband, Pastor Sean Goff. And as the police dug deeper into the mystery of Joy’s disappearance, they started to uncover some dark family secrets. Sean Goff wasn’t an ordinary pastor…he was actually the leader of an underground network of polygamists.

episodes.title: The Disturbed Scare Actor Who Started A Cult
episodes.description:
Every October, thousands of people flock to haunted house attractions in an attempt to get into the spooky spirit. The intensity of these attractions vary dramatically…ranging from unsettling to panic attack inducing. And at the heart of these haunts are the scare actors. Each night they get into costume and completely immerse themselves into their creepy characters, to give customers a night they’ll never forget. But what if I told you that the true monsters were actually the people behind the costumes. Today we’re talking about scare actors who hid their dark secrets behind a mask and used the haunted attractions as their hunting grounds.

episodes.title: Incest Cult Discovered in Backwoods of Australia | The Colt Clan
episodes.description:
#twistedtangle Download Twisted Tangle for free via this link or QR code!  https://twistedtangle.go.link/?adj_t=1eq59mqf

In 2012, a little girl was playing on her school playground in New South Wales. As the little girl played with her friends, she suddenly blurted out something very disturbing. She told her friends that her 12 year old sister is  pregnant but they didn’t know which of her brothers was the baby’s father. This comment made its way to the local authorities and an investigation was immediately launched. But the police were not prepared for what they were about to discover. This was not an isolated case of abuse between a brother and a sister…they had actually uncovered the worst case of incest that Australia had ever seen. This family had been involved in cult-like incestuous practices dating back 5 generations.

episodes.title: Quaint Seaside Town Becomes Home To Secret Sex Cult
episodes.description:
In 2010, a young woman walked into a police station in Wales and told an absolutely horrific story. The woman had been a member of a satanic sex cult since she was only 7 years old. She had been forced into the cult by her mother and from the moment they became members, their entire lives revolved around the desires of a man named Colin Batley. Colin instructed the cult members move to a cul-de-sac in Kidwelly, Wales and there they spent every second of their lives serving Colin, forced to do the most disgusting and unnatural things.

episodes.title: Bizarre Cult Holes Up In Cave For Months Awaiting The End Of The World
episodes.description:
👒 🔎Download June’s Journey for free now using my link: https://woo.ga/e9q2grug

In November of 2007, 35 members of an extremist religious group in Russia’s Penza region, gathered up supplies and made their way down into a cave. They had been sent into the cave on the orders of their leader, a 43 year old man named Pyotr Kuznetsov. Pyotr told his followers that they were God’s chosen ones and in order to survive the coming apocalypse, they were to remain inside the cave. Among their supplies were several cans of gasoline and the cult members warned authorities that they would set themselves on fire if anyone attempted to remove them from the cave. So, Russian authorities and local priests camped out near the cave for months, helplessly watching and waiting for the members to come out. And for 6 months, the world watched in disbelief as the cult members endured freezing temperatures, floods, structural collapses of the cave and starvation…and even then some remained. In the end, it would be the death of 2 of their own members that would finally force them out. And Father Pyotr, would be exposed as nothing more than a false prophet suffering from severe mental illness.

episodes.description:
Visit https://www.drinktrade.com/sommer to sign-up and save $15 on select plans -- and get your first bag of coffee free!

On the morning of March 17th 2000 the small African village of Kanungu, Uganda was suddenly ? By a massive explosive fire. The church belonging to a fanatical religious group had erupted in flames and the fire was absolutely devastating. More than 300 members of The Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God had died in the fire. The bodies inside the church were totally unrecognizable, many of the people were never identified and the actual number of deaths is unknown because some of the bodies had melted together. This was a huge blow to the community…but the nightmare didn’t end there. Over the next couple of weeks, hundreds of more bodies would be discovered in different areas of the country. These people had also been members of The Movement of the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God, and there was no doubt that these people had been brutally murdered. And soon, the country of Uganda would find itself in the middle of the biggest murder investigation it had ever seen.

episodes.title: From Family Man to Doomsday Sex Cult Leader | Wayne Bent
episodes.description:
In 1987, a man named Wayne Bent broke away from his position as head Pastor of the 7th Day Adventist church…in fact, he walked away from the religion altogether. He created his own off shoot of the SDA church and soon amassed a following of 300 ex-SDA members. At first, life seemed quaint and simple in this new church, but before long, Wayne started showing his darker side. He claimed the Archangel Michael had appeared to him and given him a message…he was the Messiah. He changed his name to Michael Travesser and brainwashed his followers into blindly trusting every single thing he said. And before long, this little known cult would make national news. “Michael” wasn’t the Messiah. He was a sexual predator.

episodes.title: From Trucker to Murderous Prophet
episodes.description:
In the 1980's, a small religious/survivalist cult was secretly living on a defunct 80 acre pig farm in Rulo, Nebraska. The cult leader was a disgusting, sadistic man named Michael Ryan. And through manipulation, physical and mental abuse and the Arm Test, (a test used by this cult as a way to speak to God) Michael Ryan would convince his followers to commit terrible crimes. And in the end, two innocent people would lose their lives.

Michael Ryan became a member of the Posse Comitatus and an avid follower of James Wickstrom's (the Posse leader) in the early 1980's, and quickly became obsessed with the religious aspects of Wickstrom's teachings. This obsession led Mike to start his own cult and ultimately led to the tragic events in today's case.

Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sommer_sanchezyt/
